reviews.review_text_liked: The hotel is perfectly located in Manhattan with easy access to all major attractions. The staff was incredibly helpful and professional throughout our stay.
reviews.review_text_disliked: The room was a bit small for the price, and the Wi-Fi connection was somewhat slow.
reviews.full_review: title: Great location and service. liked: The hotel is perfectly located in Manhattan with easy access to all major attractions. The staff was incredibly helpful and professional throughout our stay. disliked: The room was a bit small for the price, and the Wi-Fi connection was somewhat slow.
reviews.en_full_review: title: Great location and service. liked: The hotel is perfectly located in Manhattan with easy access to all major attractions. The staff was incredibly helpful and professional throughout our stay. disliked: The room was a bit small for the price, and the Wi-Fi connection was somewhat slow.
reviews.owner_resp_text: Thank you for your feedback! We're glad you enjoyed your stay and found our location convenient. We'll look into improving our Wi-Fi service.

reviews.review_text_liked: Everything exceeded our expectations! The room was beautifully decorated, breakfast was amazing, and the location near the Louvre was perfect. Staff spoke multiple languages and were very accommodating.
reviews.full_review: title: Perfect romantic getaway! liked: Everything exceeded our expectations! The room was beautifully decorated, breakfast was amazing, and the location near the Louvre was perfect. Staff spoke multiple languages and were very accommodating.
reviews.en_full_review: title: Perfect romantic getaway! liked: Everything exceeded our expectations! The room was beautifully decorated, breakfast was amazing, and the location near the Louvre was perfect. Staff spoke multiple languages and were very accommodating.

reviews.review_text_disliked: Noisy street, difficult to sleep. Check-in took too long.
reviews.full_review: liked: Clean room and good location. disliked: Noisy street, difficult to sleep. Check-in took too long.
reviews.en_full_review: liked: Clean room and good location. disliked: Noisy street, difficult to sleep. Check-in took too long.
